description: A simple L-shaped bracket with 100x50x5mm legs and two 6mm diameter mounting holes on each leg.
code:
import cadquery as cq

result = (
    cq.Workplane("XY")
    .box(100, 50, 5)
    .faces("<Y")
    .workplane(centerOption="CenterOfMass")
    .box(50, 50, 5)
    .union()
    .faces(">Z")
    .workplane()
    .pushPoints([(20, 20), (80, 20)])
    .hole(6)
    .faces("<Y")
    .workplane(offset=2.5)
    .pushPoints([(20, 10), (40, 10)])
    .hole(6)
)
prompt: A simple L-shaped bracket with 100x50x5mm legs and two 6mm diameter mounting holes on each leg.
